name: Astronaut A+ V.2 Reverb
details:
Multiverb Space UnitMeet our updated multiverb unit for cosmic sounds! Astronaut 2 is more than just a reverb, it combines a set of different effects for ambient, spacey sounds with many variations and features.
Changes (compared to the previous version of the Astronaut multiverb unit):
Improved tones and new sounds, 11 in total.
Ability to keep tails in bypass.
Decay knob added to adjust effect parameters .
Program selector with fixed positions.

Controls:
Level — output level boost. Unity at full ccw, up to +10 dBu at full cw. 
Mix — dry/wet mix that can go fully wet (kill dry) .
Decay — controls the length of the reverb, can change behavior depending on the algorithm selected  .
Program — algorithm selector.
Footswitch — activates and deactivates the effect .
Tails — preserves tails in bypass

http://shift-line.com/card.php?device=10079
